questions.text: What toy did Norm find in his attic?
questions.explanation:
Lionel Train Set.

	The Lionel Train Set came out in the early 1900s. Cliff said he got to be conductor but Norm said it was his set so he got to be the conductor.

questions.text: What is Carla's tip to making oneself less nervous by picturing them naked and wearing what?
questions.explanation:
black socks.

	Frasier was extremely anxious about a speech he had to give. When Carla told him to picture people naked, Frasier said that was an old trick. Carla then said that she put a spin on it and to picture them naked wearing black socks.

questions.text: What is the name of the man who asked Rebecca to watch his dog?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Sheridan

	Mr. Sheridan was played by Michael Currie. Currie was born in 1928 and died in 2009.

Buster.

	Buster was fine as far as Rebecca was concerned. However, all the noises in the house made it very spooky so she was on her last nerve housesitting. When Woody turned on the blender at the bar she yelled at him because it reminded her of the scary movie she saw on TV the night before.

questions.text: Who went to the house where Rebecca was dogsitting first?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam thought he could go and comfort Rebecca. And by comfort he met he hoped he could sleep with her.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say good-looking people could do?
questions.correct: spend the night together without having sex
questions.explanation:
spend the night together without having sex.

	She first told Sam that two people could spend the night together without having sex. Sam replied, "That may be true but sweetheart but we're good looking." So she explained to him that even good looking people could spend the night together and not have sex.

questions.text: What happened when the door was opened?
questions.correct: the dog ran out of the house
questions.explanation:
the dog ran out of the house.

	Sam told Rebecca that he wasn't going to stay since she didn't want to have sex. She told him to go but then as Buster bolted toward the door she yelled "Sam no wait," but it was too late Buster had already escaped.

questions.text: Did Rebecca cry in this episode?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	She cried saying it was her fault because she always did favors for people. She was afraid when Mr. Sheridan found out his dog ran away she would lose her job.

questions.text: What did Woody do to help?
questions.correct: Brought in a dog that looks like the dog Rebecca was watching
options: Called for Cliff and Norm to come find the dog
questions.explanation:
Brought in a dog that looks like the dog Rebecca was watching.

	Woody brought in a trained attack dog named Satan. Sam a few minutes later had to separate the dogs so they could bring Satan back to the pound. Woody said the command for him to attack was "Cochise" but that turned out to be wrong. The attack command was "Geronimo".

questions.text: What did Rebecca ask about being a bowling trophy?
questions.explanation:
the man's late wife's ashes.

	The ashes were stored in a huge sized urn so Rebecca said "She was a good sized woman, wasn't she?" Rebecca was trying to stall Mr. Sheridan from going into the kitchen so that Sam could get Satan out of the kitchen without Mr. Sheridan knowing Buster had ever escaped.
